sentence.Network_en: Egomania can be such a bore.

means.word_mean: 1. an intense and irresistible love for yourself and concern for your own needs

auth_sentence.content: Of course, some of this supposed insanity is nothing but self-mocking egomania.

auth_sentence.content: Contrastingly, while YSL was painfully shy in public he gorged himself on casual sex, drugs and egomania.
